thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 15 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tapimmune And Marker Therapeutics Announce Entry Into Merger Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tapimmune And Marker Therapeutics Announce Entry Into Merger Agreement
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - TapImmune Inc:
* TAPIMMUNE AND MARKER THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCE ENTRY INTO MERGER AGREEMENT, CREATING A TRANSFORMATIONAL IMMUNO-ONCOLOGY PLATFORM
* TAPIMMUNE - MARKER STOCKHOLDERS RECEIVE NEW SHARES, WARRANTS OF COâ€™S STOCK RELATED TO DEAL EQUAL TO NUMBER OF CO SHARES, WARRANTS OUTSTANDING AT DEAL CLOSE
* TAPIMMUNE INC - PROPOSED DEAL TO BE A MERGER-OF-EQUALS UNDER WHICH STOCKHOLDERS OF TAPIMMUNE AND MARKER WILL EACH OWN ABOUT 50% OF COMBINED COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
